posts.name: Mizahnyx
posts.cooked:

Any suggestion?

Thanks in advance.

Okay i can only talk about my own experience, i used r14 to build urho3d in a docker container based on a debian base image. I would not choose clang to build it, try to use another toolchain like -DANDROID_TOOLCHAIN=gcc

posts.name: Yushli
posts.cooked: r16b is using unified header only. That needs changes to the build system. Maybe @weitjong can do something about it.

posts.name: Yao Wei Tjong
posts.cooked: That one is on top of my todo list. I am about to wrap up my work with Clang-Tidy. However, I may take some break from Urho project to pursue other interests, like ML. So, no promise.
